# Loading Packages and data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
life_exp <- read.csv("../stat331-FinalProject/lex.csv")
child_mort <- read.csv("../stat331-FinalProject/child_mortality_0_5_year_olds_dying_per_1000_born.csv")
```

# Cleaning the Data 

```{r}
life_exp_clean <- life_exp |>
  pivot_longer(cols = 2:203,
               names_to = "year",
               values_to = "life_expectancy")

```
